channel.title: Hmm.. READ to understand
channel.description:
hello ~~ i am Currently making a server with..
*~Clan wars - - Added - - *~Rune Defenders - -75% - - *~Fighter Torso - - added - - *~Castlewars - - added - - *~full c00king - -added - - *~full Wc - - added - - *~25Commands - - added - - *~Full Fletching - - added - - *~Rares smithing - -added - - *~full smithing - -added- - *~Construction - -added- - *~20+Shops - - added - - *~all skills (except crafting :() - -added - - *~Crafting 25% - -
Okay.. now im just boasting =P
ok the point is if i wear a whip it goes into the Weapon Hand.. my Request is The Shield hand.. so like i wield a rubber chicken and it acts as a Shield
[b]Server Base: ownage pk[/b]
Hmm.. this is the thing i need the most so amzingly Admin on the server!!
NOTE:NOT SAYING SERVER NAME UNTIL I FINISHED IT 100% OR U WILL ALL LEECH MY NAME!
THX
